Fruitt
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): The Locker Room (Q&A): Fruitt
By Infernus on Saturday, March 24, 2007 - 07:43 am:

I've been getting a little nostalgic lately, looking through old tournaments and entries and what not, and then I remembered - I had made what I considered to be the perfect S class Henger, he was entered in the Legendcup S class bracket number three. He had an opponent by the name of Fruitt, a Metalner/Pixie, Hellraiser's entry.

There was much glorius trash talk to be had, Hellraiser mentioned something about a flaw in Fruitt, yadda yadda yadda.

I was wondering if anyone had the save with Fruitt lying around. Combined stat level was at 108 if I remember right. If at all possible, I would like a copy of this save so I can go through with the match. I just want to see how bad I would have been beaten.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, March 24, 2007 - 09:18 pm:

I checked, sorry, I don't have that save.

By Infernus on Tuesday, March 27, 2007 - 04:40 pm:

I'll keep this bumped.

Perhaps I'll get lucky and Fenrick will pop back in...he might have it.

If not him, then maybe someone else with it will see it.
